include-free-text-field.description: Should an 'Other' text field be included alongside this question or not. Only applies to `Checkboxes` or `Select` field questions. Default `false`

options.description: A line separated list of options for this question e.g. `A\nB\nC`. Only applies to `Checkboxes` or `Select` field questions.

options-free-text-field.description: A custom label for the 'Other' text field option if it's enabled. Only applies to `Checkboxes` or `Select` field questions.

required.description: Does this question require a response or not. Default `false`
